text: Baked is an Indian fiction web series chronicling the misadventures of three university flatmates who start a midnight food delivery service. It is produced by Pechkas Pictures and ScoopWhoop Talkies, written by Vishwajoy Mukherjee and Akash Mehta, and directed by Vishwajoy Mukherjee. The show's cast includes Shantanu Anam, Pranay Manchanda, Manik Papneja and Kriti Vij. It is shot in Hindu College, University of Delhi and is one of the most watched shows by students in India. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Hindi-language web series Category:2015 web series debuts
title: Baked (web series)
